channel.title: Airline Industry on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Airline Industry on FinanClub

item.title: 0940 DAL
item.description: score:940 Chances: Delta Air Lines could benefit from the rise in international travel demand as more Americans are opting for longer journeys overseas. Strong leisure travel demand is positive for U.S. airlines, including Delta Air Lines, as the market begins to recover from notable losses.

item.title: 1035 AAL
item.description: score:1035 Chances: American Airlines is in talks with planemakers Airbus and Boeing for a new narrowbody jet order, indicating potential growth opportunities. The airline is discussing its narrowbody aircraft needs for the latter half of this decade and beyond, suggesting potential fleet expansion.
